page.title: 20OUR HOPES
page.content: In Catterline we would like to see shops in the village which we don't have just now. In the village we would like to have an adventure playground for the children and also a local swimming pool. There could be a circus that comes every year.Nobody knows what might happen far off in the future. There could be a leisure centre in the village and there could be a ski slope for the winter. There could be a real football pitch that football clubs could play on, with seats for people to watch the match and there could be amusements. We don't know what Catterline will be like in the future but these are some of the things we would like to see.
